Package br.ufrn.imd.acervoliterario.service

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.acervoliterario.service.BookService
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericService<Book,BookDTO>
@Service public class BookService extends Object implements GenericService<Book,BookDTO>
Serviço para gerenciar operações relacionadas a livros.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gabriel Ribeiro
